content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Use spiderfoot to enumerate interesting files.

Variation: Spiderfoot


1. Download and install spiderfoot.
git clone https://github.com/smicallef/spiderfoot.git
cd spiderfoot
docker build -t spiderfoot .

2. Run spiderfoot.
docker run -it -p 5001:5001 -d spiderfoot

3. Use the web interface to search.
http://localhost:5001
